verbs.description: rogers woman [V: sentenced] [ARG2: for embezzling ssi benefits] a federal judge on friday oct 19 ordered a rogers woman to repay more than 55 000 in disability benefits that she embezzled over 10 years shelly spencer 51 pleaded guilty in july in u s district court to one count of theft of public money shelly spencer u s district court rogers benton county jail fayetteville
